room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: My mom (who has never done an escape room before) and I tried the Midnight Carnival room today and we both loved it! We booked the room last minute and they were very accommodating. Chris, the employee who accompanied us in the room, was so lovely and fun to be with! He really helped make my mom's first escape room an enjoyable experience. I can't wait to come back with a larger party and try another room! Thank you for a great afternoon!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: We did the Midnight Carnival with a group of friends. A lot of fun! Our puzzle master, Jason, was great. Looking forward to trying one of the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: We had a great time doing the Midnight Carnival as our first escape room. It was so much fun! Chris was a great guide and we made it out with 6 minutes to spare. We will definitely go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: We went there with 10 friends and did the Escape the Midnight Carnival. Michelle was awesome helping us with clues and we were able to escape with a little over one minute left. Puzzles were challenging and it was a really quick and fun hour!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Midnight Carnival" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: We took our staff tonight for a team building experience at Puzzle Break. We did the Carnival room and loved it. It was so much fun! David, our guide, was excellent and we really enjoyed ourselves and actually made it out by working together as a team. The whole staff loved it and it was great talking about who did what later over dinner. I highly recommend them!
